pages.content: On a bright| sunny| day,| Cicada| wakes up,| cheerily| stretching| his arms.| Yay!| Summer| has finally| come!
There is| the sound| of mother| and baby| bird| chirping| to wake each| other up| from above.| Baby birds,| wake up,| it's morning| already!

There's| the rustling| sound of| the wind,| the rhythmic| sound| of the ocean| waves,| and the sound| of children| splashing| around| and chasing| crabs| on the beach.| Woah,| just| listening| to the sounds| can make| you feel| cool!
His friends| on other| branches| have started| twittering.| He also| takes| a deep| breath,| getting| ready to| perform| with the| orchestra| anytime.| He's| actually| the lead| vocal| of the group!
In the| distance,| there's| the chattering| sound of| little| buddies| playing| in the park.| Summer| vacation| as it is.| Hanging out| is so much| fun!
Fast| coming| rain.| The little| kids| hastily| run back| home|. Cicada| really loves| watching| the rain!
The torrential| sound of| the shower| pouring| down through| the leaves| gradually| becomes| lighter,| turning| into a dripping| soundâ€¦| Finally,| the rain| totally| stops.
The sky| becomes| crystal| clear,| and there's| a colorful| rainbow| in the distance.| Cheers| can be| heard| everywhere:| "Hey,| that's| a rainbow!"
It slowly| gets dark| and the moon| steadily| emerges.| Under the| sparkling| moonlight,| Cicada| drowsily| listens to| the twittering| symphony| of the| Crickets.
The sound| of the| tidal waves| keeps| going.
